ggit.converter.model package

ggit.converter.model.hash_type

class ggit.converter.model.hash_type.GitHash(hash: str, type: HashType, path: str, repo: str)

Class that represent a git hash, associating the sha1 hash string with the type of hash, the path of the file and the path to the repository.

__hash

The sha1 hash string.

Type

str

__type

The type of hash.

Type

HashType

__path

The path of the file.

Type

str

__repo

The path to the repository.

Type

str

Parameters

  • hash (str) – The sha1 hash string.

  • type (HashType) – The type of hash.

  • path (str) – The path of the file.

  • repo (str) – The path to the repository.

class ggit.converter.model.hash_type.HashType(value)

Enum class that defines the different hash types.

COMMIT

The hash type for a commit.

Type

str

TREE

The hash type for a tree.

Type

str

BLOB

The hash type for a blob.

Type

str

class ggit.converter.model.hash_type.HashIdentifier(repository='/home/riccardoob/thesys/git_test')

Class used to obtain the hashes of the repository and their type, creating a list of GitHash objects.

Parameters

repository (str, optional) – The repository to obtain the hashes from.

__get_all_hashes() → List[GitHash]

Method that obtains the hashes of the repository and their type, creating a list of GitHash objects.

__get_all_objects() → List[Path]

Method that walks the repository .git/objects folder and a list of Path objects, containing the paths of all the objects found.

Returns

The list of Path objects of the git objects found.

Return type

List[Path]

get_hashes() → List[GitHash]

Method that calls the __get_all_hashes method and returns the list of GitHash objects.

Returns

The list of GitHash objects.

Return type

List[GitHash]
